Text: Am I supposed to be able to hear the commentary? Or is there some way to turn it on or something? The extras are great, I just want the commentary.
Nevermind, I figured it out. Great torrent, guy.

For anyone else interested in how to turn on commentary: just select the second audio track for the episodes which have one.

Your player should have a menu for audio stuff somewhere.


Glad you enjoyed it.

I'm trying to turn off the commentary with Windows Media Player.

How?
The first step is always "Stop using Windows Media Player". Some excellent alternatives: POT player, GOM player, VLC.
are these episodes censored or not?!
